Package Controller

Class Login

java.lang.Object
Controller.Login
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Login extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class that is used to authenticate the login attempt, and load other controllers.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • userName

      public void userName()
      Method to validate the username against the database. If the user exists it will call the method to check the password. If the username does not exist it will display an error message. If the systems Locale is French, the error message will be displayed in French. This method records all login attempts to the login_activity.txt file.

    • loginButtonHandler

      public void loginButtonHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Login Button Click Event. Calls the Username Validation method to check the username/password.

    • password

      public void password(String username, String providedPassword, int userID)
      Method to validate the password against the database. If the password is valid it will load the appointment screen. If the password is invalid it will display an error message. If the systems Locale is French, the error message will be displayed in French. This method records all login attempts to the login_activity.txt file.
      Parameters:
      username - Username used to login.
      providedPassword - Password used to login.
      userID - User id associated with the username.

    • locale

      public void locale(Locale locale)
      Method to load the Language resource bundle and change the displayed text to french if the system's locale is french.
      Parameters:
      locale -

    • exitCLick

      public void exitCLick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to exit the program
      Parameters:
